desc: Many hair products cause breakouts and skin irritation. Designed by a dermatologist, SEEN is skin-caring luxury hair care formulated without parabens, phthalates, sulfates, silicones, dyes, and mineral oils. SEEN products are clinically tested to be non-irritating and to not clog pores (non-comedogenic). Color-safe.

layout.text: Hair products can clog pores and irritate the scalp and skin. SEEN was developed by a Harvard-trained dermatologist and is proven to not clog pores or irritate the skin, which helps revitalize the health of the hair follicle and surrounding skin.
